summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of West Holden Street from 35th Avenue Southwest to California Avenue; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing watermains, and otherwise improving the same in accordance with Resolution No. 9686 of the City Council of the Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
